relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress, conversant and interactive.
relevant_findings.CV: Regular rate and rhythm, no audible murmurs.
relevant_findings.pulm_chest: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, breathing comfortably on room air.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, mildly tender in the RUQ.
relevant_findings.extremities: No lower extremity edema, distal extremities warm and well-perfused.
